entries.entry: We talked about HTML components and how to make grid layouts with Flexbox in CSS.
We talked about how to write and execute functions with JavaScript. To link your external JavaScript file, you must add a script tag at the bottom of your html body.
We continued to work with JavaScript on our Martin's Aquarium project, by utilizing the DOM to auto populate our webpage content with JavaScript.

Today we finished our 2nd group project which was similar to the 1st group project, but we were required to render all of our html using javascript. This project I wanted to get more comfortable with Bootstrap, so my entire country's page was done in Bootstrap.
Today we continued working with API's. We used a npm called "json-server" to build our own local API's
